DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Suspected biopsy proven Stage IAIIIA lung squamous cell carcinoma ( must prove SCC time surgery ) Medically fit surgical resection ( base surgeon assessment ) Current prior smoker Age > 18 year old Both Male Female Willing able consent study , undergo study intervention , take study drug ECOG performance status 0 , 1 , 2 Subject must start Metformin within 90 day surgery .
